sections.bioText: I am Gabriel Antunes, a dedicated visual artist, born in Recife and raised in Manaus. Since childhood, at the age of four, drawing has been my unwavering passion. At 15, I immersed myself deeply in the world of realistic drawing, committing myself to excellence in every stroke. Each piece I conceive is meticulously crafted, from its inception to the final delivery, reflecting my commitment to quality and precision. Currently based in São Paulo, I share my art through prints, aiming to convey a unique perspective of the world to those who appreciate my artistic expression.

firstMenu.title: Art Comissions
firstMenu.content:
Turn your imagination into reality with custom commissions. Collaborate  closely to bring your vision to life, tailored to your preferences and  style, for a truly unique masterpiece that speaks to you.
You can request a family portrait, a couple photo, portraits of your  pets, or even a fan art of an anime, series, or movie you like.
The price varies according to the number of elements depicted and the size of the artwork.

secondMenu.title: Art prints
secondMenu.content: Elevate your space with museum-quality prints of my artwork. Select from various sizes and premium materials to adorn your home or office with vibrant, high-definition reproductions of my original pieces.

thirdMenu.title: Original pieces
thirdMenu.content: Indulge in the allure of exclusive, one-of-a-kind artworks. Each original piece is a testament to my artistic journey, imbued with passion, creativity, and a touch of the extraordinary, enriching any collection.

sections.title: Testimonials
sections.subtitle: What who have bought are saying

testimonialCards.content: "Não consigo expressar o quão maravilhosa é a ilustração que adquiri. Cada traço, cada detalhe, transborda paixão e  habilidade. É como se a arte ganhasse vida própria quando a observo."
"Estou absolutamente extasiado com a ilustração que recebi. Sua capacidade de capturar emoções e transmiti-las através de  sua arte é verdadeiramente notável. Sem dúvida, um artista  excepcional."
"Sua arte traz uma energia tão positiva para o meu  ambiente. Estou completamente apaixonada pela sua criatividade e  habilidade. Mal posso esperar para ver mais!"

sections.title: Get in touch
sections.subtitle: Get in touch with me to explore more of my artwork. Follow me on Instagram or contact me directly via WhatsApp
